alert.note: Alert for Knox; Lewis; Shelby (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 01 at 2:44PM CST until January 02 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 11 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow, sleet, and freezing drizzle. Additional snow accumulations up to two inches, sleet accumulations less than one tenth of an inch, and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...Knox MO, Lewis MO and Shelby MO Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until Midnight CST tonight. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 1 AM to 11 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
